Making The Best Gear Even Better

Developing high-performance fit solutions for peak performance 

BOA® was born in the Rocky Mountains in 2001 with the creation of a revolutionary performance fit system that transformed the fit of snowboard boots. Today, BOA brings that same innovation to everything they do, improving fit and performance through unique configurations across multiple industries.

text_294269145_copy__1443774876.text:
Ski

 

The BOA® Fit System delivers micro-adjustable precision fit for superior heel hold and edge-to-edge control. It’s engineered to perform in the toughest conditions.

text_294269145_copy__1219056168.text:
Innovation

 

BOA creates disruptive, high-quality, and sustainable products and solutions that transform fit and performance.

text.text:
BOA Performance Fit Lab

BOA Biomechanics proved that The BOA PerformFit™ Wrap has many benefits, as demonstrated in our third-party peer reviewed paper, Evaluating footwear “in the wild”: Examining Wrap and lace trail shoe closures during trail running.

Athletes in the wrap experienced:

  • Increased Speed & Endurance: achieving up to 1.5% faster speed with the same level of exertion.
  • Improved Stability: experiencing a reduction of up to 7% in ankle rotation velocity, resulting in enhanced stability and consistency.
  • Efficient Energy Transfer: improving connection to the midsole and enhanced heel hold by up to 3%, leading to optimized energy utilization.
  • Explosive Direction Changes: demonstrating up to 9% more efficient change of direction, enabling rapid acceleration and deceleration.

text_copy.text:
What Is The BOA PerformFit Wrap?

The micro-adjustable BOA PerformFit Wrap configurations are scientifically proven to improve an athlete's speed, agility, and endurance. By wrapping over and conforming to the midfoot, it delivers superior heel lock, enhanced connection to the midsole, and greater forefoot freedom.
